name: @aeries-design/adl-tailwind-config
description: Tailwind config for Aeries Design Language
author: Zachary Guerrero <zachg@aeries.com>

scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=cdnBuild && tailwind build css/tailwind-import.css --config index.js -o dist/adl-tailwind.css

scripts.publish: git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
